Highlights.name: Survey
Highlights.description: To certify, your organisation will complete a detailed assessment of its people practices through the HR Best Practices Survey.

Highlights.name: Validation
Highlights.description: After you have completed the survey, your answers will be validated and scored by Top Employers Institute.

Highlights.name: Feedback
Highlights.description: Once officially certified as a recognised Top Employer, your organisation will receive feedback on your scoring.

enhanced_description: Top Employers Institute is a global authority that certifies organizations for excellence in people practices. Operating in 122 countries/regions, it has certified over 2,200 organizations, positively impacting 9 million employees globally. The certification program enables organizations to assess and improve their workplace environment through a detailed HR Best Practices Survey, followed by validation, scoring, and feedback on their performance.
